book.title: Driven From Home Carl Crawford's Experience
book.description: 简介： A boy of sixteen, with a small gripsack in his hand, trudged along the country road. He was of good height for his age, strongly built, and had a frank, attractive face. He was naturally of a cheerful temperament, but at present his face was grave, a...
